channel.title: Need help with a Client Problem
channel.description: i have a 525 server the source is pur3zscape and i cant use a dragonscape client to play on it b/c the hp bar thing wont work with it, so can someone tell me how to like leech a client and tell me a link to download it? i worked for like 3 weeks making this server exactly the way i wanted but i didnt realise the client wasb't gonna work so poeple help i will appreciate very much if someone told me how to and if u want i can even give u admin on my server :) also i tried like 5 different types of clients decompiled and i got some to work but the one i got to work has cheats on it like scamming peopel and teleporting in no safe zones and stuff so please help me i need this desparately
